Complex postcss-baseline-vertical-rhythm example.

This example has an extra 3 vertical units of padding at the top, and an extra 2 vertical units of padding at the bottom.

It allows for a 0.2rem thick border at the top, and a 1.3rem border at the bottom. NB: this plugin doesn't set the border widths for you - you need to do that yourself.
